description:
How about the lips on this boy! Geez! They are so plump and kissable! Or perhaps you'd like to see them wrapped around something? Yeah. Me too.
Meet JT. He's half twink, half military dude, and all SEX! This former army guy seems to like boys and girls equally, but I'm wondering if he is starting to want to play on our team a bit more.
He's got lots of sexual energy, and totally flustered me during this video. He kept his eyes on me and we definitely had some chemistry there. I left in some real quick clips of it. Heck you can even tell at the end of this video that he exhausted me when I ask my standard questions- I am pretty much spent as well.
I'm thinking we won't be seeing this one come back for a Serviced video, as playing with dudes on the side is one thing, but doing it on camera for all to see is quite another. But as he said after the video, he wouldn't be opposed to coming by to play around with out cameras. I'm never sure on the few times this happens if they are serious (or if I'm gonna be paying for it), and honestly, I'm more interested in sharing with you all than a private hookup (what am I saying...did you see those lips and amazing cock?!?!)
Hope you enjoy this guy. He really IS one sexy guy!
title: JT - Solo
